org.mini2Dx.ui.effect

Class SlideIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.effect.SlideIn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UiEffect

    public class SlideIn
extends java.lang.Object
implements UiEffect
    A UiEffect that moves a UiElement from off-screen to its target position

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float DEFAULT_DURATION 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SlideIn()
      Slide in from bottom of screen with DEFAULT_DURATION
      SlideIn(float duration)
      Slide in from bottom of screen with specific duration
      SlideIn(SlideDirection direction)
      Slide in from outside of the screen with DEFAULT_DURATION
      SlideIn(SlideDirection direction, float duration)
      Slide in from outside of the screen with specific duration

      • SlideIn

        Slide in from bottom of screen with DEFAULT_DURATION

      • SlideIn

        public SlideIn(float duration)
        Slide in from bottom of screen with specific duration

        duration - The duration of the animation in seconds

      • SlideIn

        public SlideIn(SlideDirection direction)
        Slide in from outside of the screen with DEFAULT_DURATION
        Parameters:
        direction - The slide direction. Note that this is the direction that the UiElement moves

      • SlideIn

        public SlideIn(SlideDirection direction,
               float duration)
        Slide in from outside of the screen with specific duration
        Parameters:
        direction - The slide direction. Note that this is the direction that the UiElement moves
        duration - The duration of the animation in seconds

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public boolean update(UiContainerRenderTree uiContainer,
                      CollisionBox currentArea,
                      Rectangle targetArea,
                      float delta)
        Description copied from interface: UiEffect
        Updates the effect
        Specified by:
        update in interface UiEffect
        Parameters:
        uiContainer - The UiContainerRenderTree the UiElement belongs to
        currentArea - The current area that the UiElement is set to render in. Manipulate this to change where the element renders.
        targetArea - The target area that the UiElement is set to render in as specified by the render tree and layout.
        delta - The frame delta
        Returns:
        True if the UiElement should be rendered
